data.actual_result: It is extremely hard to read.
data.short_description: The text in the channel selection drop-down menu is extremely hard to read in light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme. - Click on "Create instant invite" button below the server name of a server you have permission to create invite. - Click on the settings gear beside the invite. - Open the channel selection drop-down menu.
